page.title: 19Leisure Activities
page.content: Many leisure activities are connected with the church. The church has been used for about 30 years for Sunday School. They have a playschool as well. The playgroup ages range from 3 years old to school age. Recently the church was used for a drama group and sometimes the Woman's Guild use it. Any other uses will be considered. It is possible that next year it will be used for old people to meet and talk about things. The hall at Kirkpatrick Durham is used for coffee evenings and Ceilidhs. The old people go to the fiddlers' concert where they can get tea and cakes and talk to one another. Once in a while it is used for a flower show where you get prizes for your flowers and vegetables. If you are lucky and win a prize a small amount of money or trophy may be won.
